name: intelligent-admin
description: AI-powered administrative assistant for Australian trade businesses

scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:shared
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix && npm run lint:shared -- --fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:shared
scripts.clean: rimraf frontend/dist backend/dist shared/dist frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate
scripts.migration:check: npm audit --workspaces && npx depcheck && npx npm-check-updates --workspaces
scripts.migration:baseline: npm run test:coverage > migration-baseline.txt && npm run lint > migration-lint-baseline.txt
scripts.migration:backup: cp package-lock.json package-lock.json.backup && cp frontend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json.backup && cp backend/package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json.backup
